headline: PACCAR (PCAR) Valuation Spotlight After Truck Tariff News and Share Price Surge
summary: If you own or track PACCAR (PCAR), the latest news from Washington might have caught your attention. President Trump’s administration just announced a sweeping 25% tariff on imported heavy-duty trucks, aiming to bolster American manufacturers such as PACCAR’s Peterbilt and Kenworth brands. As traders digested the impact, PACCAR’s shares jumped, reflecting optimism that a tougher stance on foreign competition could give the company some fresh tailwinds. This tariff news arrives at a time when...
